title: KSBW Action News 8 Midday
text:
Big Red Barn gets unanimous approval to host bigger events
Big Red Barn gets unanimous approval to host bigger events
BUT THOSE ACTIVITIES WILL BRING MORE PEOPLE AND THAT HAS MANY CONCERNED.. THE BIG RED BARN IN PRUNEDALE.. KNOWN FOR IT'S WEEKEND FLEA MARKET.. IS LOOKING TO BECOME MUCH MORE.. THE OWNER SAL JIMENEZ IS SEEKING A PERMIT TO HOLD CORPORATE EVENTS AND MORE FAMILY ACTIVITIES LIKE ELECTRIC GO CARTS.. (SADIE 21:34 BECAUSE THEY'RE NOT MUCH TO DO HERE AT ALL. SO HAVING THE GO KART OR :38 OTHER ACTIVITIES NEARBY WOULD BE REALLY NICE BECAUSE OTHERWISE WE HAVE TO GO INTO HOLLISTER OR SAN JUAN, OUR SALINAS TO HAVE ANY FAMILY TIME OUTSIDE :47 OTHER THAN THE PARKS ;49 WHICH ARE GREAT :50) (SON SON 20:35 I'M REALLY EXCITED ABOUT THE GO KARTS. YEAH. MARIO KARTS FUN :40) EXCITEMENT BUT CONCERN AT THE SAME TIME.. OVER PLANS TO BRING MORE ACTIVITIES TO THE RED BARN.. THAT COULD ALSO INCLUDE CONCERTS.. FOOD FESTIVALS.. QUINCEANERAS, MOVIE NIGHTS.. A CHRISTMAS TREE LOT.. AND HAUNTED HOUSES.. NEIGHBORS CONCERNED ABOUT INCREASED TRAFFIC AND NOISE.. (ERIK 22:36 AND THAT'S GOING TO CAUSE SOME SERIOUS HEADACHE FOR US BECAUSE WE'RE RIGHT THERE AND WE ALREADY DEAL WITH A LOT OF TRAFFIC AND ALL THE ACCIDENTS RIGHT THERE. YOU'RE JUST GOING TO BE BRINGING IN MORE :47) (RICHARD 25:19 I THINK IF IT'S CONTROLLED, I MEAN, IT'S GOOD FOR THE ECONOMY, YOU KNOW, GOOD FOR THE PEOPLE. SO I, I THINK I WOULD BE IN FAVOR OF IT :25) COUNTY PLANNING COMMISSIONERS WILL TAKE UP THE PERMIT REQUEST WHEN THEY MEET WEDNESDAY.. COUNTY STAFF IS RECOMMENDING APPROVAL... AN ATTORNEY FOR THE RED BARN OWNER SAYS HE'S SENSITIVE TO THE CONCERNS OF NEIGHBORS.. (ANTHONY 19:12 AND HE DOESN'T INTEND FOR THE PROPERTY TO BECOME A NUISANCE TO ANYBODY. AND S
Advertisement
Big Red Barn gets unanimous approval to host bigger events
The Monterey County Planning Commission unanimously approved a permit that would allow the popular Big Red Barn to host bigger events. Currently, the venue is used to host the flea market every Sunday. With the new permit, the venue hopes to attract events such as weddings, quinceañeras, electric carts, weddings, outdoor movies, paintball and more. The plan is to also increase parking for the area and increase the number of vendor spaces available. There is no estimate for when these events could start taking place.
AROMAS, Calif. —
The Monterey County Planning Commission unanimously approved a permit that would allow the popular Big Red Barn to host bigger events.
Currently, the venue is used to host the flea market every Sunday.
Advertisement
With the new permit, the venue hopes to attract events such as weddings, quinceañeras, electric carts, weddings, outdoor movies, paintball and more.
The plan is to also increase parking for the area and increase the number of vendor spaces available.
There is no estimate for when these events could start taking place.
